thread.title: Auto Club Speedway picks unique way to celebrate Richard Petty's 80th birthday
thread.title_full: Auto Club Speedway picks unique way to celebrate Richard Petty's 80th birthday

title: Auto Club Speedway picks unique way to celebrate Richard Petty's 80th birthday
text:
Feb 12, 2017 at 12:37p ET 0Shares 
Richard Petty’s birthday may fall on July 1, but Auto Club Speedway is getting the celebration started early. 
In celebration of The King’s 80th birthday, the Fontana, California track is offering a special ticket package for the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series race weekend, March 25-26. "The King" wants to celebrate his 80th birthday with you at @NASCAR #AutoClub400 . New Ticket Package: https://t.co/PRJduflGnJ @RPMotorsports pic.twitter.com/Id836fvt19 
— Auto Club Speedway (@ACSupdates) February 10, 2017 
The $99 ticket package includes a reserved seat for Sunday’s Auto Club 400, a general admission ticket for Saturday’s XFINITY Series race, pre-race pit pass and a $10 donation to the Petty Family Foundation/Victory Junction. 
But here’s the best part of all: The first 80 packages purchased will be invited to an exclusive autograph session with Petty, and the offer expires March 10. 
That’s a big way to honor the seven-time Cup champion.
